references.paper_title: Dynamic storyboard generation in an engine-based virtual environment for video production
references.reason: This paper is cited as a key source for understanding dynamic camera movements in virtual environments, which is a crucial element for the proposed WHAC framework.

references.paper_title: Bedlam: A synthetic dataset of bodies exhibiting detailed lifelike animated motion
references.reason: This paper introduces the BEDLAM dataset, used as a component dataset in WHAC-A-Mole, providing a foundation for synthetic human motion data utilized in the evaluation.

references.paper_title: Smpler-x: Scaling up expressive human pose and shape estimation
references.reason: This paper presents the SMPLer-X model, the core of the human pose and shape estimation, a central component of the WHAC framework.

references.paper_title: Digital life project: Autonomous 3d characters with social intelligence
references.reason: This paper introduces the DLP-MoCap dataset, a crucial component of the WHAC-A-Mole benchmark dataset, expanding the scope of human motion captured.

references.paper_title: Synbody: Synthetic dataset with layered human models for 3d human perception and modeling
references.reason: This paper introduces SynBody, another component dataset of WHAC-A-Mole, offering diverse body shapes, clothing, and accessories, increasing the realism and diversity of the dataset.
